title: The Raven Heiress
description: Alepion has no truer friendship than in the Singing Isles and Saph, whose loyalty to the Moon Elves can only be rivaled by their prejudice for each other.Two students arrive early at the Evlon House, a Singing Elf and a Saphian, their mission; gain the favor of the other student who's also landed on Evlon's front door steps earlier than expected; the Raven Heiress.While the Singing Elf and Saphian vie for the favor of the Raven Heiress, something else lurks in the shadows, haunting Evlon's corridors, and seemingly intent upon revenge. But on who?
author: Jeremy Forsyth
